charges.charge_disposition: BOP for a term of Seventy-Eight (78) months, consisting of 78 months on each of Counts 1 and 2 to be served concurrently, and consecutive to the sentence the defendant is now serving in U.S. District Court, ED/TN, No. 1:11-CR-65-001. $100 special assessment. No fine. Restitution in the amount of $194,923.23. Of this amount, $160,444.83 is imposed jointly and severally with the restitution order imposed in the case of codefendant Michael Killion (02). The interest requirement is waived.

BOP for a term of Seventy-Eight (78) months, consisting of 78 months on each of Counts 1 and 2 to be served concurrently, and consecutive to the sentence the defendant is now serving in U.S. District Court, ED/TN, No. 1:11-CR-65-001. $100 special assessment. No fine. Restitution in the amount of $194,923.23. Of this amount, $160,444.83 is imposed jointly and severally with the restitution order imposed in the case of codefendant Michael Killion (02). The interest requirement is waived.

BOP for a term of Seventy-seven (77) months. This term shall run consecutively to any sentence the Defendant is now serving and for which he is being held. Restitution in the amount of $166,444.83. The restitution is imposed jointly and severally with the restitution order imposed or to be imposed with codefendant. No fine. $100 Special assessment.
